subject: Baseball
Cy Young Award
lead_paragraph: The Tigers’ Max Scherzer, who went 21-3 with 2.90 earned run average and 240 strikeouts, won the A.L. Cy Young Award despite not ever having pitched a complete game in his career.
snippet: The Tigers’ Max Scherzer, who went 21-3 with 2.90 earned run average and 240 strikeouts, won the A.L. Cy Young Award despite not ever having pitched a complete game in his career.
